price: (87) Those - their recompense will be that upon them is the curse of Allāh and the angels and the people, all together,
arabic: أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ جَزَآؤُهُمۡ أَنَّ عَلَيۡهِمۡ لَعۡنَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ وَٱلنَّاسِ أَجۡمَعِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: ulāika jazāuhum anna ʿalayhim laʿnata al-lahi wal-malāikati wal-nāsi ajmaʿīna
